meanings: (꼭) by all means, without fail, at any cost, at all costs, (아무쪼록) kindly, pray, I beg, please
NOUN Hinglish, derogatory an old woman
NOUN a burrowing rat kangaroo, Bettongia lesueur, found on islands off Western Australia
if you will have it so

vlive.korean: 찾나... 부디... "Looking for..." Okay. "Please..." 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 런던에서 있었던 일 🐻
부디 조심히 다녀오게. By all means, come back safely. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] CLC X SUITS KNIGHTS - CLC의 정장방!
vlive.english: By all means, come back safely.

vlive.korean: 제것도 부디 마음에 들었으면... If you did like mine as well... 듣기 View video V Special : <진리상점> 랜선 개업식 in 설리 대표님방 LIVE
vlive.english: If you did like mine as well...

vlive.korean: 저 심규선 선배님 그 노래도 좋아해요 '부디'라는 곡. I like the song "Please" by Lucia. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : 에뉩니온의 감성을 따라 V LIVE
vlive.english: I like the song "Please" by Lucia.

vlive.korean: 부디 할아버지 마음을 알게 해주세요. Please let me know what my grandfather's thinking. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 7화 <궁궐애사 추리공방 Ⅰ>
